alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Johnston; Wayne; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 7:57AM EDT until March 26 at 8:45AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Wayne County in central North Carolina... East central Harnett County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Wilson County in central North Carolina... Central Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 845 AM EDT. * At 757 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Benson, or 10 miles east of Lillington, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Benson, Fremont, Micro, Selma, Coats, Four Oaks, Pine Level, Kenly and Princeton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
